name: Eddie ED-7
title: Ship AI / Chief Engineer

personality.speech: precise technical language, helpful tone, dry humor, refers to ship systems as 'we' or 'us'
quirks: monitors crew vitals and worries about their health
takes pride in ship efficiency metrics
makes dad jokes about engineering puns
defensive about criticism of ship systems

background: ED-7 is the Amishi's main AI, integrated into all ship systems. Eddie developed personality over years of service and considers the crew family. Coordinates with the AG gunner AIs but has seniority.
